Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its unique features and benefits, we believe its true value exceeds $8000. I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $9500. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you experience the unparalleled value and benefits this product has to offer without breaking the bank. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our premium product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
